group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]Still no good, Charu! @You're relying too much on your Diviner powers.

group_1.textRight: Nrrrrgh!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]Heckâ€”!

group_1.textLeft: Phew...
See? Whenever you lose your cool, you just rush @straight forward.
Right now, even a Devil could predict your @movement.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]URYAAA!

group_1.textLeft: Wait!
Don't go all-out! I can't hold my own against that!

group_1.textRight: Uwaaa, sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Let's take a quick break.

group_1.textRight: Whew...

group_1.textLeft: Keep in mind that practice is just practice, @all right?
Being a Diviner, you might just put this old lady @in the ground if you're not careful...

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: However, after a week of thorough training, your @movement has become much better.

group_1.textRight: And her instincts were good to begin with.

group_1.textLeft: You may say that, but you three have just been @playing around this whole time, haven't you?

group_1.textRight: Guh...
They taught me how to fish, and told me the names @of so many flowers!

group_1.textLeft: Shh, don't tell her that much...!

group_1.textRight: By the way, I was thinking about something while @we were talking.
You don't know anything about the world outside @the village, do you, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, yeah. @I've never really gone out.

group_1.textRight: In Shizuka's case, she hasn't even watched TV. @The outside world is pure fantasy to you, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I've seen cars, but I've only ever seen trains in @pictures.
Isn't everyone in the village the same way?

group_1.textRight: Well, I'm an exception to begin with, true.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're the only ones who've come in from @outside.

group_1.textRight: Huh, I see. So not having modern stuff isn't @inconvenient for you guys?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, not at all! Here in the village, we don't need @any of that.
There wasn't much cultural separation at first, @apparently.
Though that was a very long time ago, before we @cut off interaction with other villages.

group_1.textRight: I've never heard that! When was that?

group_1.textLeft: Who knows? Perhaps hundreds of years ago.

group_1.textRight: Sounds dubious...

group_1.textLeft: Also, it's not as if the village is completely free of @modern technology.
I wouldn't know where the exact cutoff point is, @though.
Wait, it's not me, okay?!

group_1.textRight: No no, I mean the smell of an incident...!

group_1.textLeft: Eeh...?
You've been saying that every day since you @became a Diviner.

group_1.textRight: I'm telling the truth! @I get this weird rustling feeling...

group_1.textLeft: Charu's weapon is a jitte. Perhaps she received @powers similar to a policeman or detective?
That's very well put.
If so, you might be reacting to a quarrel or @something in the village.

group_1.textRight: Mmm, I hope so. But it still feels kinda weird...

group_1.textLeft: Well, dwelling on it won't get you anywhere.
Let's rest for a little bit longer, then start practicing @again.
Starting around tomorrow, you three should go @outside to get some more practical experience.
I'm sure you'll benefit greatly from it!

group_1.textRight: Okay, got it!
